result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerome Artel Scott

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Jerome A. Scott - #2022003574, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Claire E Zyber in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status of counsel hearing.  No attorney has been appointed.  Court ordered case adjourned to 11-8-22 at 1:30 pm for an Order to Show Cause hearing as to why an attorney has not been appointed yet. Clerk will notify State Public Defender's office of next court date.
Order to show cause hearing scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jerome Artel Scott in court, in custody.  Attorney Eugene James Dietzler Esq appeared by video for Jerome Artel Scott.  Prosecuting attorney Michelle A. Grasso in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Dietlzer is moving to withdraw due to medical reasons.  Court granted motion to withdraw.  Jury trial scheduled for 10-24-22 is vacated.  Case is adjourned to 10-10-22 at 8:30 am for status of counsel.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of motion and Motion to withdraw, filed.
Received and Filed. STATES WITNESS LIST
Received and Filed. MOTION IN LIMINE

Attorney Eugene James Dietzler in court, defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, in custody.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defendant not produced. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.

CASE HEARD IN PRELIM FOR BR. 10
Defendant Jerome Artel Scott in court, appear by video with attorney Eugene James Dietzler, appear in person.  Defendant Jerome Artel Scott in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer Janotta.   State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 10.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Eugene James Dietzler in court, defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Due to court congestion Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Eugene James Dietzler in court, defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case needs a preliminary heairng.  Case is adjojourned to 6-30-22 at 8:30 in preliminary hearing court.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Eugene James Dietzler in court, defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for State v. Lee hearing.  Public defenders office has appointed counsel on this case.  Defense counsel requests status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, defendant in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel.
Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V-LEE hearing.  Hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, defendant in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jerome Artel Scott not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
No attorney has been appointed yet and there is no victim notification for today's bail review hearing request. Bail review will be heard at the preliminary hearing court date on 4-4-22 at 8:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with Olivia M.V.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Jerome Artel Scott in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Defendant Jerome Artel Scott in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jerome Artel Scott appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor counts 2, 3, 4, 5, 9, 10, 11, 12 and 13.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  
Defense request to be heard on bail.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for March 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616

Case is adjourned to Br. PE for Br 10.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea

Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
K-Warrant
